Contact Us
Reach Out To Us
Our prices are very affordable to meet the needs of almost any budget. Planning a trip to Okeechobee or nearby in your RV? Do you still have questions? Give us a call and book your reservations for a lot today!
863-763-2944
thestarliteofokeechobee@gmail.com
9:00 AM-4:00 PM | Monday-Friday
60 S.E 30th Lane Okeechobee, FL 34974
Facebook
Choose The Best
At Starlite RR Park, our attentive staff is available Monday through Friday to answer your questions and ensure you are 100% satisfied. We always have an on-site manager available to assist in all your camping needs. Fill out the form below if you have any questions or concerns. Please keep us informed on how our Starlite staff can better serve you. We are constantly seeking to improve our community culture and we encourage your feedback.

.entry-header
About Us
Starlite RV Park of Okeechobee
We operate right here in Okeechobee Florida, a 55 and over RV park. Our passion is creating family camping memories for our guests – memories that will last a lifetime! We don’t do this as individuals, but as a passionate and caring team who aim to provide family experiences like no other. Our mission is to provide a camping vacation experience that exceeds our guests’ expectations and causes our guests to come back and refer us to others. By doing this well we will create value for the Company and make a difference in our guests’ lives.
We Offer That Personal Touch You Have Been Looking For
Here at The Starlite Rv Park, our mission is to provide unparalleled customer service combined with offering premier outdoor resorts, amenities, and activities for you and your spouse to enjoy the great outdoors. We hope to be the most enjoyable camping experience you’ll have in Florida.
Choose The Best
Starlite RV Park proudly serves our community of neighbors and friends throughout Okeechobee, Florida. An RV can be a great way to take control of your trip and save money. Instead of going through the hassle of expensive flights, you can rent an RV or find one to purchase for road trips almost anywhere you can imagine across the USA. You can also enjoy cooking for yourself, hitch your bikes on the back, and/or spend a romantic evening in your camper. There’s no limit to the amount of fun you can enjoy with an RV. When you get ready to park, a good RV park can provide all the amenities you need. Our RV park is a great way for you to park while enjoying exclusive amenities. For example, some parks have electrical hookups for your recreational vehicle or internet services. Each RV park is different and will offer its own sense of community. Residents of the park are usually friendly and prepared to lend a hand. You can rent a space to park your RV for a specific amount of days. The type of RV park you choose can play a major role in nearby and onsite amenities.
Your Satisfaction Is Important To Us
Being a family-owned & operated business, we’re able to offer you that personal touch you’ve been looking for. Our goal is to make all of our campers happy – we look forward to hearing from you.
First started by Ron & Tami Larowe. They wanted to create a park that was friendly, clean, and affordable. We still maintain these values today. The Starlite RV Park is family owned & operated right here in Okeechobee. Since our company opened its doors in 2006, we’ve treated every customer like they were part of our family. Other companies may offer similar services, but our services are the best and come with a personal touch.
Reach Out To Us
